creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Empires in a medieval civilization will witness rise of four kingdoms with clans clashing in this MMORPG💢. Empires are forged by allies & cunning kings in the stone age where kings build empires🏘 & fortresses with townsmen. Empire Four Kingdoms is an MMO experiencing rise of four civilizations🌇 & empires where castles are built & kings clash for victory , an experience in the ages of medieval empires. This empire game is a legend that will give glory & victory to the true war lord who will rule from the iron designed throne, the bling kingdom, with honor.

Build Empires & Strike Wars in Kingdoms - True War Game


🏰Build an Empire with strategic trading of stone age resources in the medieval era
🏯Team fortress & castles to defend your kingdom in wars from dragons🐉 & ruling kings
✌Alliances with kings & other multiplayers to help you conquer rival clans & gain territory on an interactive world map
♞Train your knights for the reign of fire as the king of kings as a war of dragons is eminent
Strike kingdoms with archers & shoot arrows🏹 to the mobile escaping lords
Enemies advancing towards your palace? Chat with friend or foe empire kingdoms or join the MMO community & active forum for advice to make your kingdom of empires the most powerful of all
👷Build over 60 different constructions & trade resources to gain wealth in gold 🜚& silver🜛 for swords, shields⛨, wood & fire🔥

Witness an Age of Rising Empires and Civilizations


United we stand, Divided we fall - Build alliances & conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies & fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. Conquer kings & defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle & build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle & create a resourceful army.

Forge Empires with Alliances


Join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy & medieval war game - Empire: Four Kingdoms. With powerful rulers, fierce battles & strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.

Battle War Ground Strategy Game


With the imperialist rulers ruling the townsmen in despair & capable of striking a war of dragons, you must protect the earth empire from various clans of kingdoms in the medieval stone age. The throne is forged by deceiving warriors from massive royale clans. Are you ready to attack these empires and claim victory?

Empire Building Games with War Lords


Social empires are not won by just attacking. There is strategy & planning involved, resources are collected & empires are built in villages by constructing buildings, mining stone, smelting weapons, building town halls, training soldiers, knights & archers. The earth empire must be able to defend itself from the cunning war lords.

Rise of Castles in Kingdoms with Fortress


Fight clan wars & clan battles to achieve victory over forts & knights. Possessing state buildings of several empires to become the king of all kingdoms is the mission for this strategy war game.
* Grow from a novice to a knight with decorative war items
* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The new month brings a host of changes to the Great Empire. New achievements for events and challenges await those who are looking to test their mettle, while a new boost system was added to global effects to increase their potency. An improved filter system is also now available for selling equipment and the relicus' item selection.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
POWER AND VANITY

Hail the king! Sovereign skills now offer powerful upgrades to your castles! Stronger walls, towers, gates, and moats will make invading hordes crumble against your defenses. You can also take the fight to the enemy with upgradable military units. More power also awaits with the improved crest system! It truly is a wonderful time to be king!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
TURNING UP THE HEAT

Ransacking your enemies in this heat is bound to build up a thirst. Luckily, we have some new buildings, build items and coat of arms symbols to boost your honey & mead production and inspire your troops to greater victories! Use their new-found vigor to win rewards in our upcoming events and be sure to pay the new Bestseller shop a visit should you have some rubies burning a hole in your pocket.

* Grow from a novice to a knight with decorative war items
* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
TURNING UP THE HEAT

Ransacking your enemies in this heat is bound to build up a thirst. Luckily, we have some new buildings, build items and coat of arms symbols to boost your honey & mead production and inspire your troops to greater victories! Use their new-found vigor to win rewards in our upcoming events and be sure to pay the new Bestseller shop a visit should you have some rubies burning a hole in your pocket.

title: Empire: Four Kingdoms | Medieval Strategy MMO

creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Empires in a medieval civilization will witness rise of four kingdoms with clans clashing in this MMORPG💢. Empires are forged by allies & cunning kings in the stone age where kings build empires🏘 & fortresses with townsmen. Empire Four Kingdoms is an MMO experiencing rise of four civilizations🌇 & empires where castles are built & kings clash for victory , an experience in the ages of medieval empires. This empire game is a legend that will give glory & victory to the true war lord who will rule from the iron designed throne, the bling kingdom, with honor.

Build Empires & Strike Wars in Kingdoms - True War Game


🏰Build an Empire with strategic trading of stone age resources in the medieval era
🏯Team fortress & castles to defend your kingdom in wars from dragons🐉 & ruling kings
✌Alliances with kings & other multiplayers to help you conquer rival clans & gain territory on an interactive world map
♞Train your knights for the reign of fire as the king of kings as a war of dragons is eminent
Strike kingdoms with archers & shoot arrows🏹 to the mobile escaping lords
Enemies advancing towards your palace? Chat with friend or foe empire kingdoms or join the MMO community & active forum for advice to make your kingdom of empires the most powerful of all
👷Build over 60 different constructions & trade resources to gain wealth in gold 🜚& silver🜛 for swords, shields⛨, wood & fire🔥

Witness an Age of Rising Empires and Civilizations


United we stand, Divided we fall - Build alliances & conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies & fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. Conquer kings & defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle & build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle & create a resourceful army.

Forge Empires with Alliances


Join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy & medieval war game - Empire: Four Kingdoms. With powerful rulers, fierce battles & strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.

Battle War Ground Strategy Game


With the imperialist rulers ruling the townsmen in despair & capable of striking a war of dragons, you must protect the earth empire from various clans of kingdoms in the medieval stone age. The throne is forged by deceiving warriors from massive royale clans. Are you ready to attack these empires and claim victory?

Empire Building Games with War Lords


Social empires are not won by just attacking. There is strategy & planning involved, resources are collected & empires are built in villages by constructing buildings, mining stone, smelting weapons, building town halls, training soldiers, knights & archers. The earth empire must be able to defend itself from the cunning war lords.

Rise of Castles in Kingdoms with Fortress


Fight clan wars & clan battles to achieve victory over forts & knights. Possessing state buildings of several empires to become the king of all kingdoms is the mission for this strategy war game.
* Grow from a novice to a knight with decorative war items
* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
OUT OF THE MIST

A mysterious fog engulfs the Outer Realms, from which emerge strangely familiar looking structures ... It looks like a portal has opened, allowing castle lords to transfer a copy of their main castle to the Outer Realms! New defensive units are also now available from the Hall of Legends, while new boosters are available for mead and honey production.

👷Build over 60 different constructions & trade resources to gain wealth in gold 🜚& silver🜛 for swords, shields⛨, wood & fire🔥

Witness an Age of Rising Empires and Civilizations


United we stand, Divided we fall - Build alliances & conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies & fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. Conquer kings & defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle & build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle & create a resourceful army.

Forge Empires with Alliances


Join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy & medieval war game - Empire: Four Kingdoms. With powerful rulers, fierce battles & strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.

Battle War Ground Strategy Game


With the imperialist rulers ruling the townsmen in despair & capable of striking a war of dragons, you must protect the earth empire from various clans of kingdoms in the medieval stone age. The throne is forged by deceiving warriors from massive royale clans. Are you ready to attack these empires and claim victory?

Empire Building Games with War Lords


Social empires are not won by just attacking. There is strategy & planning involved, resources are collected & empires are built in villages by constructing buildings, mining stone, smelting weapons, building town halls, training soldiers, knights & archers. The earth empire must be able to defend itself from the cunning war lords.

Rise of Castles in Kingdoms with Fortress


Fight clan wars & clan battles to achieve victory over forts & knights. Possessing state buildings of several empires to become the king of all kingdoms is the mission for this strategy war game.
* Grow from a novice to a knight with decorative war items
* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
SNOWLAND HUNT

Winter covers the Great Empire in a white blanket of death and silence. Savage beasts prowl the lands looking for the weak and defenseless. Join the Beasts of the Snowlands event and launch surprise attacks against your unsuspecting enemies.
Also, you can now decide whether ruby units will be admitted to each castle's hospital.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
FAVORS OF WAR

War always changes, and your commanders have to be ready for any kind of challenge. You now can mark favorite equipment items, find them much more easily in your inventory, and quickly change your commanders's setups. Also, in the Outer Realms, the daily duty contest will grant you rewards from previous reward levels.

The new temporary build items can be placed in the appearance slot of your buildings. For a limited time they will improve efficiency and change the building's appearance. Also, there are great news from the Storm Islands! No longer will honor be lost in a battle between castle lords, and storage capacity for aquamarine has been increased!

title: Empire: Four Kingdoms | Medieval Strategy MMO

creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Empires in a medieval civilization will witness rise of four kingdoms with clans clashing in this MMORPG💢. Empires are forged by allies & cunning kings in the stone age where kings build empires🏘 & fortresses with townsmen. Empire Four Kingdoms is an MMO experiencing rise of four civilizations🌇 & empires where castles are built & kings clash for victory , an experience in the ages of medieval empires. This empire game is a legend that will give glory & victory to the true war lord who will rule from the iron designed throne, the bling kingdom, with honor.

Build Empires & Strike Wars in Kingdoms - True War Game


🏰Build an Empire with strategic trading of stone age resources in the medieval era
🏯Team fortress & castles to defend your kingdom in wars from dragons🐉 & ruling kings
✌Alliances with kings & other multiplayers to help you conquer rival clans & gain territory on an interactive world map
♞Train your knights for the reign of fire as the king of kings as a war of dragons is eminent
Strike kingdoms with archers & shoot arrows🏹 to the mobile escaping lords
Enemies advancing towards your palace? Chat with friend or foe empire kingdoms or join the MMO community & active forum for advice to make your kingdom of empires the most powerful of all
👷Build over 60 different constructions & trade resources to gain wealth in gold 🜚& silver🜛 for swords, shields⛨, wood & fire🔥

Witness an Age of Rising Empires and Civilizations


United we stand, Divided we fall - Build alliances & conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies & fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. Conquer kings & defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle & build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle & create a resourceful army.

Forge Empires with Alliances


Join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy & medieval war game - Empire: Four Kingdoms. With powerful rulers, fierce battles & strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.

Battle War Ground Strategy Game


With the imperialist rulers ruling the townsmen in despair & capable of striking a war of dragons, you must protect the earth empire from various clans of kingdoms in the medieval stone age. The throne is forged by deceiving warriors from massive royale clans. Are you ready to attack these empires and claim victory?

Empire Building Games with War Lords


Social empires are not won by just attacking. There is strategy & planning involved, resources are collected & empires are built in villages by constructing buildings, mining stone, smelting weapons, building town halls, training soldiers, knights & archers. The earth empire must be able to defend itself from the cunning war lords.

Rise of Castles in Kingdoms with Fortress


Fight clan wars & clan battles to achieve victory over forts & knights. Possessing state buildings of several empires to become the king of all kingdoms is the mission for this strategy war game.
* Grow from a novice to a knight with decorative war items
* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
AT THE END OF THE RAINBOW

The greenest of holidays brings fresh delights to the Great Empire! Prepare for a great battle against the Shamrock king and his minions! Also, reward pools for King Ludwig's nobility contest and seasonal contest have been updated.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
RAISE YOUR TANKARDS

Your master brewers have refined their skills further, allowing never before seen precision in the brewing process. Check out the brewery and try out the improved brewing controls.
Also, reward pools for the invasion events have been updated, and the inner district is available as a Top 100 reward in King Ludwig's seasonal nobility contests.

* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

Your master brewers have refined their skills further, allowing never before seen precision in the brewing process. Check out the brewery and try out the improved brewing controls.

creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Empires in a medieval civilization will witness rise of four kingdoms with clans clashing in this MMORPG💢. Empires are forged by allies & cunning kings in the stone age where kings build empires🏘 & fortresses with townsmen. This empire game is a legend that will give glory & victory to the true war lord who will rule from the iron designed throne, the bling kingdom, with honor.

Build Empires & Strike Wars in Kingdoms - True War Game


🏰Build an Empire with strategic trading of stone age resources in the medieval era
🏯Team fortress & castles to defend your kingdom in wars from dragons🐉 & ruling kings
✌Alliances with kings & other multiplayers to help you conquer rival clans & gain territory on an interactive world map
♞Train your knights for the reign of fire as the king of kings as a war of dragons is eminent
Strike kingdoms with archers & shoot arrows🏹 to the mobile escaping lords
Enemies advancing towards your palace? Chat with friend or foe empire kingdoms or join the MMO community & active forum for advice to make your kingdom of empires the most powerful of all
👷Build over 60 different constructions & trade resources to gain wealth in gold 🜚& silver🜛 for swords, shields⛨, wood & fire🔥

Witness an Age of Rising Empires and Civilizations


United we stand, Divided we fall - Build alliances & conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies & fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. Conquer kings & defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle & build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle & create a resourceful army.

Forge Empires with Alliances


Join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy & medieval war game - Empire: Four Kingdoms. With powerful rulers, fierce battles & strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.

Battle War Ground Strategy Game


With the imperialist rulers ruling the townsmen in despair & capable of striking a war of dragons, you must protect the earth empire from various clans of kingdoms in the medieval stone age. The throne is forged by deceiving warriors from massive royale clans. Are you ready to attack these empires and claim victory?

Empire Building Games with War Lords


Social empires are not won by just attacking. There is strategy & planning involved, resources are collected & empires are built in villages by constructing buildings, mining stone, smelting weapons, building town halls, training soldiers, knights & archers. The earth empire must be able to defend itself from the cunning war lords.

Rise of Castles in Kingdoms with Fortress


Fight clan wars & clan battles to achieve victory over forts & knights. Possessing state buildings of several empires to become the king of all kingdoms is the mission for this strategy war game.

* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
THE TREASURE FLEET

A new wave of adventurers is getting ready to sail for the Storm Islands. The emperor has decreed that from now on both alliances and individual lords will be rewarded for the aquamarine cargo sent back to the Great Empire. Ready your ships and join Luna Stormrider for a new adventure in the endless blue seas!

United we stand, Divided we fall - Build alliances & conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies & fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. Conquer kings & defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle & build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle & create a resourceful army.

Forge Empires with Alliances


Join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy & medieval war game - Empire: Four Kingdoms. With powerful rulers, fierce battles & strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.

Battle War Ground Strategy Game


With the imperialist rulers ruling the townsmen in despair & capable of striking a war of dragons, you must protect the earth empire from various clans of kingdoms in the medieval stone age. The throne is forged by deceiving warriors from massive royale clans. Are you ready to attack these empires and claim victory?

Empire Building Games with War Lords


Social empires are not won by just attacking. There is strategy & planning involved, resources are collected & empires are built in villages by constructing buildings, mining stone, smelting weapons, building town halls, training soldiers, knights & archers. The earth empire must be able to defend itself from the cunning war lords.

Rise of Castles in Kingdoms with Fortress


Fight clan wars & clan battles to achieve victory over forts & knights. Possessing state buildings of several empires to become the king of all kingdoms is the mission for this strategy war game.
* Grow from a novice to a knight with decorative war items
* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

The master brewers have also fine-tuned the controls of the brewery to allow better management of food and mead resources.

THE SCARY SEASON

Sinister things are stirring in the great Empire. Ancients crypts have been broken open, unspeakable cults perform dark rituals, and monstrous abominations shift behind the veil of sanity. Be prepared, for Halloween is near. Gain scary new rewards from Halloween events, enjoy updated reward pools, and various small bug fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
TRADER'S DELIGHT

It's been a productive month for the castle's courtiers. Not only have the crafty traders of the merchant's guild conjured up a means to sell the unwanted buildings in your global inventory for valuable goods, but the army medics have tweaked their treatment plans to optimize the healing priority of warriors arriving in the hospital. Long live progress!

title: Empire: Four Kingdoms

creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Empires in a medieval civilization will witness rise of four kingdoms with clans clashing in this MMORPG💢. Empires are forged by allies & cunning kings in the stone age where kings build empires🏘 & fortresses with townsmen. Empire Four Kingdoms is an MMO experiencing rise of four civilizations🌇 & empires where castles are built & kings clash for victory , an experience in the ages of medieval empires. This empire game is a legend that will give glory & victory to the true war lord who will rule from the iron designed throne, the bling kingdom, with honor.

Build Empires & Strike Wars in Kingdoms - True War Game


🏰Build an Empire with strategic trading of stone age resources in the medieval era
🏯Team fortress & castles to defend your kingdom in wars from dragons🐉 & ruling kings
✌Alliances with kings & other multiplayers to help you conquer rival clans & gain territory on an interactive world map
♞Train your knights for the reign of fire as the king of kings as a war of dragons is eminent
Strike kingdoms with archers & shoot arrows🏹 to the mobile escaping lords
Enemies advancing towards your palace? Chat with friend or foe empire kingdoms or join the MMO community & active forum for advice to make your kingdom of empires the most powerful of all
👷Build over 60 different constructions & trade resources to gain wealth in gold 🜚& silver🜛 for swords, shields⛨, wood & fire🔥

Witness an Age of Rising Empires and Civilizations


United we stand, Divided we fall - Build alliances & conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies & fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. Conquer kings & defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle & build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle & create a resourceful army.

Forge Empires with Alliances


Join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy & medieval war game - Empire: Four Kingdoms. With powerful rulers, fierce battles & strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.

Battle War Ground Strategy Game


With the imperialist rulers ruling the townsmen in despair & capable of striking a war of dragons, you must protect the earth empire from various clans of kingdoms in the medieval stone age. The throne is forged by deceiving warriors from massive royale clans. Are you ready to attack these empires and claim victory?

Empire Building Games with War Lords


Social empires are not won by just attacking. There is strategy & planning involved, resources are collected & empires are built in villages by constructing buildings, mining stone, smelting weapons, building town halls, training soldiers, knights & archers. The earth empire must be able to defend itself from the cunning war lords.

Rise of Castles in Kingdoms with Fortress


Fight clan wars & clan battles to achieve victory over forts & knights. Possessing state buildings of several empires to become the king of all kingdoms is the mission for this strategy war game.
* Grow from a novice to a knight with decorative war items
* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
PRECIOUS STONES

Need just a few more rubies to purchase that special piece of equipment? Then pay a visit to the new Offerwall! Just choose an offer from one of our partners and complete the requirements. Each completed offer pays out a fixed amount of rubies when completed. Easy money!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
CHALLENGES AND CHOICES

The new year brings new challenges and rewards:
- The Samurai Invasion's difficulty system allows you to choose a challenge level for the enemy's camps and castles, and earn more valuable rewards.
- Help requests in the military hospital now send out a request of all healing stacks.
- The settings menu has been reworked.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

The new year brings new challenges and rewards:

- The settings menu has been reworked.

title: Empire: Four Kingdoms

creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Empires in a medieval civilization will witness rise of four kingdoms with clans clashing in this MMORPG💢. Empires are forged by allies & cunning kings in the stone age where kings build empires🏘 & fortresses with townsmen. Empire Four Kingdoms is an MMO experiencing rise of four civilizations🌇 & empires where castles are built & kings clash for victory , an experience in the ages of medieval empires. This empire game is a legend that will give glory & victory to the true war lord who will rule from the iron designed throne, the bling kingdom, with honor.

Build Empires & Strike Wars in Kingdoms - True War Game


🏰Build an Empire with strategic trading of stone age resources in the medieval era
🏯Team fortress & castles to defend your kingdom in wars from dragons🐉 & ruling kings
✌Alliances with kings & other multiplayers to help you conquer rival clans & gain territory on an interactive world map
♞Train your knights for the reign of fire as the king of kings as a war of dragons is eminent
Strike kingdoms with archers & shoot arrows🏹 to the mobile escaping lords
Enemies advancing towards your palace? Chat with friend or foe empire kingdoms or join the MMO community & active forum for advice to make your kingdom of empires the most powerful of all
👷Build over 60 different constructions & trade resources to gain wealth in gold 🜚& silver🜛 for swords, shields⛨, wood & fire🔥

Witness an Age of Rising Empires and Civilizations


United we stand, Divided we fall - Build alliances & conquer rival kings in MMO battle. Defend your castle from enemies & fight a medieval war with epic PvP strategy. Conquer kings & defend your kingdom in this epic PvP strategy game. Do you have what it takes to rule an empire, fight enemies, defend your castle & build a growing army to dominate the Four Kingdoms? With this epic MMO game, you can employ cunning strategy to defend your kingdom, wisely choose your alliances to fight with you in battle & create a resourceful army.

Forge Empires with Alliances


Join millions of players in this award-winning multiplayer strategy & medieval war game - Empire: Four Kingdoms. With powerful rulers, fierce battles & strategic masterminds, your best PvP battle skills will come to the fore.

Battle War Ground Strategy Game


With the imperialist rulers ruling the townsmen in despair & capable of striking a war of dragons, you must protect the earth empire from various clans of kingdoms in the medieval stone age. The throne is forged by deceiving warriors from massive royale clans. Are you ready to attack these empires and claim victory?

Empire Building Games with War Lords


Social empires are not won by just attacking. There is strategy & planning involved, resources are collected & empires are built in villages by constructing buildings, mining stone, smelting weapons, building town halls, training soldiers, knights & archers. The earth empire must be able to defend itself from the cunning war lords.

Rise of Castles in Kingdoms with Fortress


Fight clan wars & clan battles to achieve victory over forts & knights. Possessing state buildings of several empires to become the king of all kingdoms is the mission for this strategy war game.
* Grow from a novice to a knight with decorative war items
* Quests with objectives for different levels of experience, become a fierce warrior
* Different wars zones from multiple countries, go on national wars by making alliances
* Collect taxes from the villagers & enrich the royal wealth of the empire

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

- The options menu has new and improved functionality.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
KNOWLEDGE IS POWER
Springtime bring many improvements big and small to the great Empire!
- The research tower has been expanded. Core researches give advantages to new lords, while upgraded military units strengthen the armies of experienced warriors.
- New feast levels have been added. These replace the previous feasts when reaching level 70. Also, the recruitment slowdown during protection mode has been adjusted.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ready, set, go!
- The “Archmaster” just got harder! Get ready to take on the toughest difficulty level and win epic rewards.
- The long-established Colossus event has been updated to increase the maximum public order gained though the event decorations.
- You can now queue up a new feast and not lose out on your recruitment bonus
- and last, but not least, there is a new E-Mail account management

title: Empire: Four Kingdoms

creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Build a powerful empire and fight epic battles against millions of players!

As king and lord, you have been called upon to build a mighty fortress and control the fate of your kingdom in this award-winning medieval adventure MMO strategy game

Conquer new lands in four exciting kingdoms
Recruit an army of valiant knights, equip your merciless troops with deadly weapons, rise their ranks, and send them into battle to fight under your banner! Of course, every great empire also needs a strong defense - choose the right strategy to send your enemy’s army fleeing in terror!

Honor, glory, and riches
Win rewards by achieving honor and glory in battle, and go from rags to riches by managing your kingdom wisely. Build your fortress from the bottom up so that it becomes the greatest in the land. Produce resources and trade with other players to expand your empire in multiple kingdoms. More land means more subjects - and more gold for you

Forge powerful diplomatic alliances
Join forces with your friends and other lords to stand against your enemies and conquer new lands together! Support each other by sending resources or troops, or help each other to rebuild after an attack. United we stand!

This realistic medieval strategy MMO will transport you back to an age when power was everything and only the strongest survived. Prove that you've got what it takes to be the mightiest and most honorable lord in all the land

* Create your civilization and become a king in the medieval strategy game
* Fight epic wars against countless other players on the interactive world map
* Build a majestic castle to withstand even your strongest opponents
* Raise an army of knights, archers, swordsmen, and more
* Form an unbeatable alliance with your friends and other powerful players
* Produce and trade resources to construct more than 60 different buildings
* Explore Empire Four: Kingdoms and become a true hero and legend!
* Regular updates with new content and challenges



Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions, and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection, and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

- The long-established Colossus event has been updated to increase the maximum public order gained though the event decorations.
- You can now queue up a new feast and not lose out on your recruitment bonus
- and last, but not least, there is a new E-Mail account management

title: Empire: Four Kingdoms

creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Build a powerful empire and fight epic battles against millions of players!

As king and lord, you have been called upon to build a mighty fortress and control the fate of your kingdom in this award-winning medieval adventure MMO strategy game

Conquer new lands in four exciting kingdoms
Recruit an army of valiant knights, equip your merciless troops with deadly weapons, rise their ranks, and send them into battle to fight under your banner! Of course, every great empire also needs a strong defense - choose the right strategy to send your enemy’s army fleeing in terror!

Honor, glory, and riches
Win rewards by achieving honor and glory in battle, and go from rags to riches by managing your kingdom wisely. Build your fortress from the bottom up so that it becomes the greatest in the land. Produce resources and trade with other players to expand your empire in multiple kingdoms. More land means more subjects - and more gold for you

Forge powerful diplomatic alliances
Join forces with your friends and other lords to stand against your enemies and conquer new lands together! Support each other by sending resources or troops, or help each other to rebuild after an attack. United we stand!

This realistic medieval strategy MMO will transport you back to an age when power was everything and only the strongest survived. Prove that you've got what it takes to be the mightiest and most honorable lord in all the land

* Create your civilization and become a king in the medieval strategy game
* Fight epic wars against countless other players on the interactive world map
* Build a majestic castle to withstand even your strongest opponents
* Raise an army of knights, archers, swordsmen, and more
* Form an unbeatable alliance with your friends and other powerful players
* Produce and trade resources to construct more than 60 different buildings
* Explore Empire Four: Kingdoms and become a true hero and legend!
* Regular updates with new content and challenges



Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions, and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection, and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You have been heard!
- A new protection will be automatically triggered to limit repeated sabotage
- Mystery boxes can now be won or bought to receive a myriad of legendary rewards.

Have you been inactive for some time?
- Get 5 days protection mode and no burning castle
Come back and make a triumphant return!

title: Empire: Four Kingdoms

creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Build a powerful empire and fight epic battles against millions of players!
As Lord and King, you have been called upon to build a mighty fortress and control the fate of your kingdom in this award-winning medieval adventure MMO strategy game!

Use your strategy to outsmart your enemies!
Unlock powerful Generals and use their abilities to your advantage. It is not about who has the biggest army, but who can plan their every move in the most cunning way. Each General has special talents that will give you an edge to defeat opponents, but only when used wisely. Plan your strategy carefully and see if you are wily enough to outsmart your enemies!

Conquer new lands in four exciting kingdoms
Muster an army of valiant knights, equip your merciless troops with deadly weapons, improve their skills, and send them into battle to fight under your banner! Of course, every great empire also needs a strong defense - choose the right strategy to send your enemy’s army fleeing in terror!

Honor, glory, and riches!
Win rewards by achieving honor and glory in battle, and go from rags to riches by managing your kingdom wisely. Build your fortress from the foundations up, so that it becomes the mightiest across the land. Produce resources and trade with other players to expand your empire over multiple kingdoms. More land means more subjects - and more gold for you!

Forge powerful diplomatic alliances
Join forces with your friends and other lords to stand against your enemies and conquer new lands together! Support each other by sending resources or troops, or help each other to rebuild after an attack. United we stand!

This realistic medieval strategy MMO will transport you back to an age when power was everything and only the strongest survived. Prove that you've got what it takes to be the mightiest and most honourable lord in all the land!

♚ Create your civilisation and become a king in this medieval strategy game
♚ Fight epic wars against countless other players on an interactive world map
♚ Build a majestic castle to withstand even your strongest opponents
♚ Raise an army of knights, archers, swordsmen, and more
♚ Form an unbeatable alliance with your friends and other powerful players
♚ Produce and trade resources to construct more than 60 different buildings
♚ Explore Empire: Four Kingdoms and become a true hero and legend!
♚ Regular updates with new content and challenges

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions, and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection, and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Empire's biggest update yet has just dropped! The powerful Generals are here to lead the serried ranks of your armies towards victory. Unlock them all! Upgrade their skills and use them wisely, as a well planned strategy will be even more important to defeat a canny opponent. Are you a legendary strategist ready to conquer the Great Empire?

title: Empire: Four Kingdoms

creator: Goodgame Studios
descriptionHtml:
Build a powerful empire and fight epic battles against millions of players!
As Lord and King, you have been called upon to build a mighty fortress and control the fate of your kingdom in this award-winning medieval adventure MMO strategy game!

Use your strategy to outsmart your enemies!
Unlock powerful Generals and use their abilities to your advantage. It is not about who has the biggest army, but who can plan their every move in the most cunning way. Each General has special talents that will give you an edge to defeat opponents, but only when used wisely. Plan your strategy carefully and see if you are wily enough to outsmart your enemies!

Conquer new lands in four exciting kingdoms
Muster an army of valiant knights, equip your merciless troops with deadly weapons, improve their skills, and send them into battle to fight under your banner! Of course, every great empire also needs a strong defense - choose the right strategy to send your enemy’s army fleeing in terror!

Honor, glory, and riches!
Win rewards by achieving honor and glory in battle, and go from rags to riches by managing your kingdom wisely. Build your fortress from the foundations up, so that it becomes the mightiest across the land. Produce resources and trade with other players to expand your empire over multiple kingdoms. More land means more subjects - and more gold for you!

Forge powerful diplomatic alliances
Join forces with your friends and other lords to stand against your enemies and conquer new lands together! Support each other by sending resources or troops, or help each other to rebuild after an attack. United we stand!

This realistic medieval strategy MMO will transport you back to an age when power was everything and only the strongest survived. Prove that you've got what it takes to be the mightiest and most honourable lord in all the land!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

descriptionHtml:
Build a powerful empire and fight epic battles against millions of players!
As Lord and King, you have been called upon to build a mighty fortress and control the fate of your kingdom in this award-winning medieval adventure MMO strategy game!

Use your strategy to outsmart your enemies!
Unlock powerful Generals and use their abilities to your advantage. It is not about who has the biggest army, but who can plan their every move in the most cunning way. Each General has special talents that will give you an edge to defeat opponents, but only when used wisely. Plan your strategy carefully and see if you are wily enough to outsmart your enemies!

Conquer new lands in four exciting kingdoms
Muster an army of valiant knights, equip your merciless troops with deadly weapons, improve their skills, and send them into battle to fight under your banner! Of course, every great empire also needs a strong defense - choose the right strategy to send your enemy’s army fleeing in terror!

Honor, glory, and riches!
Win rewards by achieving honor and glory in battle, and go from rags to riches by managing your kingdom wisely. Build your fortress from the foundations up, so that it becomes the mightiest across the land. Produce resources and trade with other players to expand your empire over multiple kingdoms. More land means more subjects - and more gold for you!

Forge powerful diplomatic alliances
Join forces with your friends and other lords to stand against your enemies and conquer new lands together! Support each other by sending resources or troops, or help each other to rebuild after an attack. United we stand!

This realistic medieval strategy MMO will transport you back to an age when power was everything and only the strongest survived. Prove that you've got what it takes to be the mightiest and most honourable lord in all the land!

♚ Create your civilisation and become a king in this medieval strategy game
♚ Fight epic wars against countless other players on an interactive world map
♚ Build a majestic castle to withstand even your strongest opponents
♚ Raise an army of knights, archers, swordsmen, and more
♚ Form an unbeatable alliance with your friends and other powerful players
♚ Produce and trade resources to construct more than 60 different buildings
♚ Explore Empire: Four Kingdoms and become a true hero and legend!
♚ Regular updates with new content and challenges

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions, and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection, and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
EMPEROR'S DELIGHTS

His Imperial Majesty has granted his loyal subjects magnificent treasures:
- New content for the Beyond the Horizon reward pool, King Ludwig's seasonal event reward pool, and the Master Blacksmith's sceat shop packages.
- Exchange small time skips for longer ones in the special bestseller shop.
- A new convenience feature has been added to player subscription #2: An attacking army can automatically use time skips to skip the cooldown of a nomad camp or samurai camp.

As Lord and King, you have been called upon to build a mighty fortress and control the fate of your kingdom in this award-winning medieval adventure MMO strategy game!

Use your strategy to outsmart your enemies!
Unlock powerful Generals and use their abilities to your advantage. It is not about who has the biggest army, but who can plan their every move in the most cunning way. Each General has special talents that will give you an edge to defeat opponents, but only when used wisely. Plan your strategy carefully and see if you are wily enough to outsmart your enemies!

Conquer new lands in four exciting kingdoms
Muster an army of valiant knights, equip your merciless troops with deadly weapons, improve their skills, and send them into battle to fight under your banner! Of course, every great empire also needs a strong defense - choose the right strategy to send your enemy’s army fleeing in terror!

Honor, glory, and riches!
Win rewards by achieving honor and glory in battle, and go from rags to riches by managing your kingdom wisely. Build your fortress from the foundations up, so that it becomes the mightiest across the land. Produce resources and trade with other players to expand your empire over multiple kingdoms. More land means more subjects - and more gold for you!

Forge powerful diplomatic alliances
Join forces with your friends and other lords to stand against your enemies and conquer new lands together! Support each other by sending resources or troops, or help each other to rebuild after an attack. United we stand!

This realistic medieval strategy MMO will transport you back to an age when power was everything and only the strongest survived. Prove that you've got what it takes to be the mightiest and most honourable lord in all the land!

♚ Create your civilisation and become a king in this medieval strategy game
♚ Fight epic wars against countless other players on an interactive world map
♚ Build a majestic castle to withstand even your strongest opponents
♚ Raise an army of knights, archers, swordsmen, and more
♚ Form an unbeatable alliance with your friends and other powerful players
♚ Produce and trade resources to construct more than 60 different buildings
♚ Explore Empire: Four Kingdoms and become a true hero and legend!
♚ Regular updates with new content and challenges

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EmpireFourKingdoms
Privacy Policy, Terms Conditions, and Imprint: https://www.goodgamestudios.com/terms_en/
* This app is completely free to play, requires an internet connection, and offers optional in-app purchases.
descriptionShort: Fight medieval kings, build alliances & conquer enemies with PVP battle strategy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Step into a new era of strategy and conquest with our latest release! Prepare yourself for the ultimate challenge as we unveil an array of groundbreaking researches in the Hall of Legends. Strengthen your army, sharpen your tactics, and embark on an epic journey to domination like never before. Don't miss out on the biggest release of the year – update now and elevate your game to new heights!

Unlock powerful Generals and use their abilities to your advantage. It is not about who has the biggest army, but who can plan their every move in the most cunning way. Each General has special talents that will give you an edge to defeat opponents, but only when used wisely. Plan your strategy carefully and see if you are wily enough to outsmart your enemies!

Conquer new lands in four exciting kingdoms
Muster an army of valiant knights, equip your merciless troops with deadly weapons, improve their skills, and send them into battle to fight under your banner! Of course, every great empire also needs a strong defense - choose the right strategy to send your enemy’s army fleeing in terror!

Honor, glory, and riches!
Win rewards by achieving honor and glory in battle, and go from rags to riches by managing your kingdom wisely. Build your fortress from the foundations up, so that it becomes the mightiest across the land. Produce resources and trade with other players to expand your empire over multiple kingdoms. More land means more subjects - and more gold for you!

Forge powerful diplomatic alliances
Join forces with your friends and other lords to stand against your enemies and conquer new lands together! Support each other by sending resources or troops, or help each other to rebuild after an attack. United we stand!

This realistic medieval strategy MMO will transport you back to an age when power was everything and only the strongest survived. Prove that you've got what it takes to be the mightiest and most honourable lord in all the land!

♚ Create your civilisation and become a king in this medieval strategy game
♚ Fight epic wars against countless other players on an interactive world map
♚ Build a majestic castle to withstand even your strongest opponents
♚ Raise an army of knights, archers, swordsmen, and more
♚ Form an unbeatable alliance with your friends and other powerful players
♚ Produce and trade resources to construct more than 60 different buildings
♚ Explore Empire: Four Kingdoms and become a true hero and legend!

Conquer new lands in four exciting kingdoms
Muster an army of valiant knights, equip your merciless troops with deadly weapons, improve their skills, and send them into battle to fight under your banner! Of course, every great empire also needs a strong defense - choose the right strategy to send your enemy’s army fleeing in terror!

Honor, glory, and riches!
Win rewards by achieving honor and glory in battle, and go from rags to riches by managing your kingdom wisely. More land means more subjects - and more gold for you!

Join forces with your friends and other lords to stand against your enemies and conquer new lands together! Support each other by sending resources or troops, or help each other to rebuild after an attack. United we stand!

This realistic medieval strategy MMO will transport you back to an age when power was everything and only the strongest survived. Prove that you've got what it takes to be the mightiest and most honourable lord in all the land!

Each General has special talents that will give you an edge to defeat opponents, but only when used wisely. Plan your strategy carefully and see if you are wily enough to outsmart your enemies!

Conquer new lands in four exciting kingdoms
Muster an army of valiant knights, equip your merciless troops with deadly weapons, improve their skills, and send them into battle to fight under your banner! Of course, every great empire also needs a strong defense - choose the right strategy to send your enemy’s army fleeing in terror!

Honor, glory, and riches!
Win rewards by achieving honor and glory in battle, and go from rags to riches by managing your kingdom wisely. Build your fortress from the foundations up, so that it becomes the mightiest across the land. Produce resources and trade with other players to expand your empire over multiple kingdoms. More land means more subjects - and more gold for you!

Forge powerful diplomatic alliances
Join forces with your friends and other lords to stand against your enemies and conquer new lands together! Support each other by sending resources or troops, or help each other to rebuild after an attack. United we stand!

This realistic medieval strategy MMO will transport you back to an age when power was everything and only the strongest survived. Prove that you've got what it takes to be the mightiest and most honourable lord in all the land!

♚ Create your civilisation and become a king in this medieval strategy game
♚ Fight epic wars against countless other players on an interactive world map
♚ Build a majestic castle to withstand even your strongest opponents
♚ Raise an army of knights, archers, swordsmen, and more
♚ Form an unbeatable alliance with your friends and other powerful players
♚ Produce and trade resources to construct more than 60 different buildings
♚ Explore Empire: Four Kingdoms and become a true hero and legend!
♚ Regular updates with new content and challenges
